item.title: 508 need help making npcs tradeable
item.dc:creator: @ima_rare ima rare
item.description:
@ima_rare wrote:

okay i have a problem, i know how to spawn npcs but i don’t know how to make them tradeable and on the source im using i cant find where to edit what are in the shops on my other source tokkulscape source it was in player, on this source vistascape 508 there not in player, this is all i could find: public int shopid = 0; but on my other source it had these:
public int[] shop2 = {590, 6739, 1359, 1275, 1321,1323, 1325, 1327, 1329, 1331, 1333, 1305, 12844, 301, 305,307,311,11259,5698,-1,-1,-1,-1,-1,-1,-1,-1};
public int[] shop2n = {100, 10, 50, 50, 100,100,100,100,100,100,100,100, 100, 100, 100,100,100,100,100,1,1,1,1,1,1,1,1};
public int[] shop2p = {50, 50, 1000000, 10000,20,50,80,120,170,230,18000,80000, 35, 5, 5,5,5,5,30000,0,0,0,0,0,0,0,0};

but there is already some shops on my vistascape 508 source shouldnt there already be some coded then… i know im not explaining this well but could anyone please help me.
